overview: Ron Jeremy - Fucking in Finland presents the world-stars TurkkuSex visit from airport to airport. The film crew went alongside Ron throughout the five-day visit, so unique back stage material is guaranteed. However, the main part of the film is Ron's parade fucks with Finnish girls. Some of the scenes were filmed in the live studio of the fair, but only some. The incorruptible camera was also present when the star fucked the Finnish chicks in his hotel room, in the back seat of a limousine and even in the sauna!
tagline: See Jeremy's journey to Finland in whole from airport to airport!
title: Ron Jeremy Fucking in Finland
